snippet.title: Darkest Dungeon II - Inhuman Bondage DLC Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
“Tortured and reclusive, this man is more dangerous than he seems.”

Darkest Dungeon II's second paid DLC, Inhuman Bondage, is launching on the Epic Games Store and Steam later this year.

Plunge your stagecoach into the long-forgotten Catacombs beneath the Kingdom and face a corrosive, oozing threat! Uncover powerful items in this new mini-region, and gain access to The Abomination, a fearsome new playable hero with unique battle mechanics.

Wishlist Inhuman Bondage on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3205310/Darkest_Dungeon_II__Inhuman_Bondage/
Wishlist Inhuman Bondage on Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/darkest-dungeon-2--inhuman-bondage
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1940340/Darkest_Dungeon_II/ 
Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/darkest-dungeon-2 
Website: https://www.darkestdungeon.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/darkestdungeon
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DarkestDungeon
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DarkestDungeon
Instagram: https://instagram.com/redhookstudios
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/darkestdungeon.bsky.social
